name: XWUI Input Date Component
description: Date input component combining XWUIInput with XWUIPickerDate. Provides a text input field with a calendar popup for date selection. Supports full view (inline calendar) and minimized view (popup calendar).

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

view.description: View mode: 'full' shows calendar inline, 'minimized' shows calendar as popup

iconName.description: Icon name for the calendar icon

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the input field

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Selected date value (Date object or string)
